string-array.name: intermediate_translation
string-array.item: "to stop something from reaching its intended destination"
"having lost the physical, mental, or moral qualities considered normal"
"something is full of tiny holes or openings or easily penetrated"
"a person, animal, or plant unable to reproduce"
"something that takes place in the daytime or has a daily cycle"
"suffer or something that remain in existence"
"n achievement that requires great courage, skill, or strength."
"best or most favorable for a given situation"
"a specific kind of animals or plants that can breed with each other"
"to go in a direction that is away from the place where you should be"
"things that are very different from each other"

string-array.name: intermediate_example1
string-array.item: "Crashing waves have eroded the cliffs along the beach."
"The police intercepted him as he was walking out."
"The morale of the soldiers degenerated, and they were unable to fight."
"he ran through a porous defense to score easily"
"All too often, infertile women are considered cursed."
"The drought caused serious damage to crops."
"the emission of poisonous gas has many negative health effects."
"Careful planning facilitates any kind of work."
"You are a treasure , beyond price , one of a kind , irreplaceable."
"A diurnal animal hunts its food during daylight ."
"She wasn't able to endure being at a disadvantage."
"a performer known for her astonishing acrobatic feats"
"He keeps his engine tuned for optimal performance."
"Both of her cats were strays that she found wandering in the neighborhood."
"His message appealed to a diverse audience."
"The plant is sensitive to extreme heat and cold."

string-array.name: intermediate_example2
string-array.item: "Different types of rock will normally erode at vastly different rates."
"His popularity extends from city to city"
"intelligence agencies intercepted a series of telephone calls"
"Blood is the ﬂuid responsible for the circulation of nutrients."
"The mad cow disease caused many unfortunate cows to degenerate, forcing many to avoid eating beef."
"the police found a porous dead body at the middle of the city."
"My wife and I tried very hard to have children, but apparently she's infertile."
"At current emission levels, we will suffer Total Weather Apocalypse by 2050."
"It was to facilitate my studies that i came here."
"He is irreplaceable in her heart, she feels pampered , spoiled and loved."
"Pikas are diurnal, active throughout the year, and have a characteristic call, "chickck-chickck.""
"I cannot endure that noise a moment longer."
"Writing that whole report in one night was quite a feat."
"Under optimal conditions, these plants grow quite tall."
"All European domestic cattle belong to the same species."
"Don't stray from the main point of the question."
"The surface of mars is remarkably diverse."

string-array.name: intermediate_example3
string-array.item: "A giraffe extends its neck to get food. "
"“The fighter plane was ordered to intercept an aircraft that had entered the country's airspace”"
"You need more nutrients in your diet."
"Your boyfriend ran off with another woman and took your best jewelry?! Why, that degenerate-!"
"Since the small nation had porous borders, it was an easy target for invasion."
"infertile soil can't sustain agricultural plant growth."
"During droughts, farmers are barely able to make out a living."
"many companies are trying to reduce the emission of greenhouse gases"
"Our trade and development program will facilitate our progress ."
"Government has an irreplaceable responsibility in enhancing the social justice."
"I could only spare two or three hours, from my numerous diurnal occupations."
"She wants to make sure her legacy will endure."
"It was quite a feat to move that piano by yourself."
"If one really wants to go for optimal health the answer is the more the better"
"The kind lady's house was always open to strays."
"Today's businesses are increasingly complex and diverse."
"He has extreme opinions when it comes to politics."
